original_text: He said to them, ‘You brought this man to me. You said that he was causing the people to fight against their rulers. Listen! I have asked him some questions in front of you. But I have not found that he has done anything wrong.
korean_text: 이르되 너희가 이 사람이 백성을 미혹하는 자라 하여 내게 끌고 왔도다 보라 내가 너희 앞에서 심문하였으되 너희가 고발하는 일에 대하여 이 사람에게서 죄를 찾지 못하였고

sentences.original_text: You brought this man to me
You said that he was causing the people
I have asked him some questions
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그에게 몇 가지 질문을 했다

sentences.original_text: that he has done anything wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 잘못된 어떤 일도 한 것을
